job.description: strongGaming Industry OpportunitybrbrstrongThis Jobot Job is hosted by Angel MaciasbrbrAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumebrbrSalary 80000  110000 per yearbrbrstrongA Bit About UsbrbrstrongTitle Gameplay Software EngineerbrbrLocation Chicago Illinois Possible RemotebrbrBased in the suburbs of Chicago we are a cutting edge gaming and technology company growing at a tremendous pace We are currently looking for Software Engineers with CC skills to join our team If you are an Software Engineer in the greater Chicago Illinois market looking to disrupt the entertainment industry apply today or send your resume directly to angelmaciasjobotcombrbrstrongbrbrstrongWhy join usbrbrbrstrongstrongDo you want to be part of the gaming and entertainment industry with a highly reputable companybrulli Competitive Base Salarylili Flexible Work Scheduleslili Accelerated Career GrowthbrliulstrongJob DetailsbrbrstrongLooking for strong Software Engineers with backgrounds in gameplay programmingbrulli 10 years CC experience lili Game development and programminglili Video game industry experience lili 3D studio MAXlili WindowsLinuxbrliulInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button
